item.title: Using motor driver DRV8833
item.description: Here you can find how to use motor driver based on DRV8833 (datasheet). I have chip with some NC (not connected) pins, like on picture below: Connection scheme Scheme below shows how to control two motors simultaneously using single potentiometer. I tried with joystick, but default one has too low working angles and huge blind zones where resistance doesn’t change. PINS, elements Description AIN1, AIN2 2V, 50kHz pwm to control motor 1 BIN1, BIN2 2V, 50KHz pwm to control motor 2 STBY pass high signal (2V) to enable controller, or low (0V) to enter low-power sleep mode and reset all internal logic VM 11V max, external DC source.
